lines.text: I wish he was dead - I wish they *all* were dead
All those people dead - it was *you* all the time!
[comforting Tracie, whose parents were just slain]

What's wrong? My mother and father were killed in front of me! My best friend and my aunt were shot because of this formula! It just doesn't make any sense! Dad only wanted to do good, and now everybody's dead!
